QuestData.Title: Last Piece of the Puzzle
QuestData.Description: I must say, $n, despite their skirmishes with the hozen, I've never seen the jinyu so militant.$b$bThis troubles me. We must discuss it another time, however. I have come to ask for your assistance.$b$bThe fresco, where last we spoke, is nearly unveiled. I am certain that it holds ancient wisdom - knowledge that the emperor would have us remember.$b$bMy meditations alone may not be enough to discern its meaning. Please, take this heirloom to the shrine of my ancestors. I shall require their assistance.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Cho's Heirloom at Cho's Family Shrine on Serpent's Overlook.$b$bSpeak with Mishi for transportation.
QuestData.RewardText: <Lorewalker Cho shudders, in spite of himself.>$b$bThe legends... they're true!

Objectives.Objective: Heirloom placed at Cho Family Shrine
